roleset.name: to act as the boss of

example.name: With extent
example.text: Melinda found that she bossed him more, telling him what their plans were for the weekend, what movie she'd like to see.
example.arg: telling him what their plans were for the weekend, what movie she'd like to see

example.name: adjectival rel: bossy
example.text: Our people are restrained and introverted , not as outspoken or bossy as foreigners ,

example.name: With intervening arg1
